BugInstance.message: Enum class org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.api.check.consistency.DataConsistencyCheckIgnoredType only declares one enum value
Method new org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.api.check.consistency.DataConsistencyCheckResult(DataConsistencyCountCheckResult, DataConsistencyContentCheckResult) sets an enum reference to null
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.api.datanode.JobDataNodeEntry.marshal() passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.api.ingest.position.IntegerPrimaryKeyPosition.convert(String) converts String to boxed primitive using excessive boxing
Comparator method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.api.ingest.position.PlaceholderPosition.compareTo(PlaceholderPosition) doesn't seem to return all ordering values
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.core.api.impl.AbstractInventoryIncrementalJobAPIImpl.getInventoryTasksProgress(Collection) does not presize the allocation of a collection

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.core.api.impl.AbstractInventoryIncrementalJobAPIImpl.showProcessConfiguration(PipelineContextKey) stores return result in local before immediately returning it
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.core.api.impl.GovernanceRepositoryAPIImpl.persistCheckJobResult(String, String, Map) allocates an object that is used in a constant way in a loop
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.core.api.impl.GovernanceRepositoryAPIImpl.getCheckJobResult(String, String) does not presize the allocation of a collection
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.core.api.impl.GovernanceRepositoryAPIImpl.persistCheckJobResult(String, String, Map) does not presize the allocation of a collection
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.core.check.consistency.DataConsistencyCheckUtils.isBigDecimalEquals(BigDecimal, BigDecimal) calls BigDecimal.equals(), which is normally a mistake
